channel.title: Sponsored bidding
channel.description:
Decided to make this topic to not be annoying for Moparisthebest
I made my application for a sponsor spot on the first of this month but I still have not been approved. I am scared I did something wrong, posted it to late or to early or misunderstood something.
Its not very clear and its my first time so I would appreciate it if someone can give me a awnser.
Thanks!

item.title: Sponsored bidding
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

You’re approved or denied before the first 10 days of the month so you can partake in the bidding for that month. Now, I would approve/deny you but I’ve no idea the criteria so I’ll pass it on to someone else.

Read full topic

item.title: Sponsored bidding
item.dc:creator: @yoeril yoeril
item.description:
@yoeril wrote:

Jmood:

Iirc it goes until the 10th of the month, also you could have pmed a Moderator or another Administrator about this.

So I did good?

Read full topic
